sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Register.css"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" const Register = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() React.useEffect(() => { if (localStorage.getItem("myToken")) { navigate("/main"); } }); const [registerDetails,setRegisterDetails] = React.useState({ username:"", password:"", serial:"", name:"", surname:"", telephone:"", house_no:"", village_no:"", alley:"", lane:"", road:"", sub_district:"", sub_area:"", district:"", province:"", postal_code:""}) const onSubmitButtonClick = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("clicked") console.log(registerDetails) let response = await fetch("https://ecourse.cpe.ku.ac.th/exceed07/api/register",{ method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(registerDetails), headers:{ "Content-Type": "application/JSON;charset=UTF-8" } }) response = await response.json() console.log(response) if(response.detail === "User has been register"){ navigate("/register=success") } else{ navigate("/register=fail") } } return (
Back to login
Username setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, username: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.username}/> Password setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, password: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.password}/> Serial Number setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, serial: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.password}/> Name setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, name: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.name}/> Surname setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, surname: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.surname}/> Telephone setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, telephone: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.telephone}/> House Number setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, house_no: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.house_no}/> Village setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, village_no: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.village_no}/> Alley setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, alley: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.alley}/> Lane setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, lane: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.lane}/> Road setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, road: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.road}/> Sub District setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, sub_district: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.sub_district}/> Sub Area setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, sub_area: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.sub_area}/> District setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, district: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.district}/> Province setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, province: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.province}/> Postal Code setRegisterDetails({...registerDetails, postal_code: e.target.value})} value = {{registerDetails}.postal_code}/>
); }; export default Register;
